content:
Name Crit Effect Type
Clipped your Hand You take 1d8 persistent bleed damage. Melee
Oopsie! You hit yourself instead of the target. Ranged
Ingrown Nail You take a -1 circumstance penalty to attack rolls until your score a critical hit. Unarmed
Clatto Verata Necktie You critically hit your nearest ally. Spell
name: Critical Fumble Deck #46
